summary: Adds a nice Player Home just a few minutes away from Dragon's Bridge, Solitude!
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE22/10/14:
BUG:- BRIDGES NAVIMESH STILL ISNT WORKING.
Guys, I just learned how to do it, so ill give it a go! ^_^ Thanks for all your messages!!
Update1.2: I give up. XD..

~~~

UPDATE17.10.14.:
INSTALL UPDATE VERSION 1.1 - THAT IS FIXED.
Fixed: The Bridge. Added Alchemy Table and Enchanting Table. Removed Imperial and Stormcloak flags.

~~~


Dragon's View is a Player Home just off of Dragon's Bridge outside Solitude.
Built for those Nord-Loving, Imperial-side fans, who really just enjoy Skyrims capital than anywhere else..

The home is a ground level farm home, but large.
It comes with Solitude Flags, a bridge so you can get across the waterfall to and from the home.
The home also comes with a small blacksmithing area which is just down the path from the home! (See Photos!)
For location check the photo of the Map :)

If you are struggling still to find it, go to Dragon's Bridge and follow the main river, up the waterfall and keep going until you find the wooden bridge! :D


Bug:
None so far, but in progress of making it - there were a lot! But they have been fixed! :)

Requirements:
Skyrim and Update! :D

Please leave feedback and if you spot any bugs ^_^ Thanks!

DoodleBugRain
author: DoodleBugRain
